logo_management.title: Logo & Profile Management
logo_management.file_requirements: PNG, JPG, SVG, or WebP. Max 5MB.
logo_management.bio_requirements: Brief company description for the member directory.
logo_management.admin_only: Note: Logo changes are reviewed by FASE administrators
logo_management.fase_downloads_desc: Download FASE logos for your marketing materials

usage_consent.title: Usage Permission
usage_consent.description: By uploading, you grant FASE permission to:
usage_consent.logo_use: Use your logo in the member directory and other public materials
usage_consent.bio_edit: Edit, translate, and publish your company bio
usage_consent.agreement: I agree to these usage terms

success.upload_successful: Profile uploaded successfully! Our team will review your submission.

errors.invalid_file_type: Invalid file type. Please use PNG, JPG, SVG, or WebP.
errors.file_too_large: File too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
errors.consent_required: You must agree to the usage terms.
errors.missing_fields: Please fill in all required fields.
errors.provide_content_and_consent: Please provide either a logo or bio and agree to usage terms
